name: Decat
description:
Made for the Jammingtons 3.0 Game Jam.

Decat is a game where you need to help a zombie cat to survive during the time limit, before it decays and lose all its parts.

Controls: Left Mouse Click to interact.

Team Members: 
Jean Lucas  Bahia
Jéssica Nicoletti
Kevin Olayon Navarro
Mateus Maurício Forno
